title: NextJs-Dashboard
description: NextJs-Dashboard is a modern, responsive dashboard project built with TypeScript, CSS, and JavaScript, showcasing best practices for creating dynamic user interfaces with Next.js. This repository provides a foundation for building scalable web applications with a focus on clean architecture, reusable components, and efficient data fetching. It serves as a learning resource and a practical starting point for developers looking to explore Next.js and dashboard development.

title: devboard
description: Devboard is a full-stack project built with Next.js 14 (using the Pages Router), TypeScript, and Material UI (MUI), designed as a customizable dashboard starter kit. It leverages React Query for efficient data fetching and caching, offering a solid foundation for rapidly developing data-driven web applications. The repository showcases best practices in TypeScript development and Next.js architecture, serving as a valuable learning resource for developers working with modern React-based frameworks.

title: next-idea-board
description: Next Idea Board is a web application built with TypeScript, JavaScript, and CSS designed to facilitate collaborative idea generation and project management. This project allows users to create and organize ideas, fostering a dynamic and interactive environment for brainstorming and planning. Leveraging modern web technologies, it provides a user-friendly platform for teams and individuals to structure their thoughts and move seamlessly from initial concepts to actionable project plans.

title: sleep-debt-tracker
description: Sleep-Debt-Tracker is a web application built with TypeScript, JavaScript, CSS, and HTML designed to help users monitor and manage their sleep debt. This project allows users to track their sleep schedule, calculate accumulated sleep debt, and visualize sleep patterns, promoting healthier sleep habits. It serves as a practical demonstration of TypeScript's capabilities in front-end development and explores concepts within the broader realm of personal health and wellness tracking.

title: jovian
description: Jovian is a Python-based CRUD application built with Flask and PostgreSQL, designed to provide a user-friendly interface for managing data. This project utilizes HTML, CSS, and Shell scripting alongside Python to deliver a functional and well-structured web application, showcasing best practices in web development and database interaction for practical Python projects.

title: Map-Visualisation
description: Map-Visualisation is a project leveraging HTML and Python to create interactive and insightful map visualizations. This repository explores techniques for displaying geographical data, potentially incorporating features like data overlays, customizable markers, and interactive elements to enhance user understanding of spatial information. The focus is on providing a clear and engaging way to present data within a geographical context.

title: resume

It serves as a personal project demonstrating skills and experience, showcased through both a printable document and a potentially web-viewable format.

title: finance-with-python
description: This repository, built using Jupyter Notebook and Python, contains a collection of projects focused on applying Python to financial analysis and modeling. It explores various aspects of finance, providing practical examples and code for understanding concepts like portfolio optimization, risk management, and stock analysis. It serves as a learning resource for individuals interested in leveraging Python for financial applications.

title: next-voting
description: Next-Voting is a modern, real-time voting application built with Next.js (TypeScript, JavaScript, and CSS) designed as a project demonstration. It leverages the power of Next.js to create a dynamic and responsive user experience for managing and participating in polls. The repository provides a foundation for understanding and building similar interactive web applications.

title: iot-asset-tracking
description: This repository hosts a modern web application built with Next.js, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, and Supabase for tracking IoT assets. It leverages real-time data and a clean, responsive UI to provide users with a comprehensive overview of their assets' location, status, and historical movements. This project demonstrates a full-stack approach to IoT asset management, showcasing best practices in web development with a focus on scalability and maintainability.

title: dynamic-event-calendar
description: Dynamic-event-calendar is a project showcasing a customizable and interactive event calendar built using JavaScript, CSS, and HTML. It allows users to dynamically display and manage events, providing a flexible and user-friendly way to organize schedules and timelines. This repository serves as a practical example of front-end development techniques and calendar implementation, focusing on clean code and a visually appealing user interface.

title: ros-log-viewer
description: Ros-log-viewer is a web-based tool for visualizing and analyzing ROS (Robot Operating System) log files. Built using JavaScript, Python, HTML, CSS, and Shell scripting, it provides a user-friendly interface for filtering, searching, and understanding ROS logs, aiding in debugging and improving robot performance. This project focuses on providing practical log analysis capabilities within the ROS ecosystem.

title: genietalks
description: GenieTalks is a web application built with TypeScript, Vite, and Express.js that leverages the Gemini API to provide intelligent and engaging conversations. This project showcases a modern tech stack including HTML, CSS, and JavaScript for the front-end, and demonstrates the integration of AI capabilities within a web environment. It serves as a practical example of using the Gemini API and building a full-stack application with a focus on conversational interfaces.

title: fruit-seller
description: Fruit-Seller is a comprehensive e-commerce platform built with Next.js 14 (utilizing the pages router), TypeScript, and React, leveraging the power of MUI for its user interface and React Query for efficient data fetching. This project demonstrates best practices in modern web development, showcasing a type-safe and performant approach to building online stores and covering key e-commerce concepts.
